>
[Charmed Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=1523) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 89 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Charisma 14

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw, but you haven't rolled yet.

</column>

---

When danger calls, you have a strange knack for coming out on top. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering save.

<title level="2">Charmed Life leads to...</title>
[Incredible Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=1556)
